Flash, Flying
Whenever UMG0 Shadowflock enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile a card named Flutter Rebuttal, a card named Witherweight, and/or a card named Prowling Peck from your graveyard. If you do, copy them, you may cast the copies without paying their mana cost.
